employerForm.title: Request Clinicians
employerForm.description: Tell us your staffing need and our team will reach out quickly.
employerForm.successMessage: Thanks! Your staffing request has been received.

items.q: How quickly can you fill urgent shifts?
items.a: For urgent requirements, our team can often provide qualified options within 24–48 hours based on role and location.

items.q: Do you support credentialing and compliance?
items.a: Yes. We assist with license checks, credential tracking, and onboarding documentation workflows.

items.q: Can clinicians choose travel or permanent opportunities?
items.a: Absolutely. We support travel, per diem, contract, and permanent placements.

items.q: How do employers submit a request?
items.a: Use the Request Clinicians form on the website or contact our staffing desk directly by phone/email.
